name: The Chorus
description: Pierre, a successful orchestra conductor, returns home when his mother dies. He stumbles upon an old diary and recollects the childhood school memories and his music teacher Clement Mathieu.

name: Danton
description: After the French Revolution, former allies Maximilien Robespierre and Georges Danton turn into enemies when Robespierre objects to Danton conducting mass executions.

name: Once Upon a Time in Anotolia
description: When two brothers confess to committing a murder in the Anatolian town of Keskin, the town officials accompany them to look for the dead body in the middle of the night.

name: Eternity and a Day
description: Famous writer Alexander is very ill and has little time left to live. He meets a little boy on the street, who is an illegal immigrant from Albania, and goes on a journey with him.

name: Jean de Florette
description: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.

name: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
description: A young boy lives in a floating temple on a lake together with an elderly master who teaches him the ways of the Buddha. He runs off to the city, but returns as the lifestyle there does not suit him.

name: Germinal
description: In mid-nineteenth-century northern France, a coal mining town's workers are exploited by the mine's owner. One day, they decide to go on strike, and the authorities repress them.

name: Climax
description: A group of French dancers gathers in an empty school to rehearse and party. However, their celebration soon turns into a nightmare when they realise that their drinks are spiked with LSD.

name: Anatomy of a Fall
description: In an isolated mountain chalet near Grenoble, novelist Sandra Voyter decides to reschedule her interview with a female student because her husband, university lecturer Samuel Maleski.
